title.rendered: Livodox Syrup 500 ML Natural liver support, Ayurvedic Liver health, Assists in metabolism, Herbal Liver Detox

content.rendered:
• This Ayurvedic formulation may provide effective support for liver health with a comprehensive blend of selected herbs, all aimed at promoting optimal liver function.It addresses fatty liver and sluggish liver issues, supports natural detoxification, and may helps protect the liver from free radical damage. This sugar-free syrup is ideal for those monitoring their sugar intake.

Key Benefits:

  • May helps address fatty liver and sluggish liver issues.
  • Assists in natural liver detox and overall liver health.
  • May support healthy liver function and promotes detoxification.
  • May protect liver cells from free radical damage with powerful antioxidants.
  • May Aid in weight loss and promote healthy weight management.
  • Sugar-free formula, making it perfect for individuals monitoring their sugar intake.
Direction of use: Take 15 ml twice daily, before breakfast and before dinner.
Ingredients: Guduchi, Triphala, Arjuna, Kasni, Kalmegh, Bhuiamlaki|, Punarnava Base.
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. This product is a dietary supplement, not medicine.
